Rectangle tool

Back to index

The rectangle tool can be used to create and modify rectangles.

  1. The create rectangle layer button creates a new rectangle layer.
  2. Inputs for controlling the x and y coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle on the canvas. These values must be positive whole numbers.
  3. Inputs for controlling the size of the rectangle, with the x input setting the horizontal length of the rectangle, and the y input setting the vertical length.
  4. A colour input for setting the fill (background) colour of the rectangle.
  5. A colour input for setting the stroke (border) color of the rectangle.
  6. An input for setting the stroke (border) width of the rectangle. This is additional to the given size of the rectangle. This input must be a positive whole number.

The rectangle tool only works with rectangle layers. If the selected layer is not a rectangle layer, the inputs provided by the rectangle tool will be disabled.
